1.content:
Where will you go first?

The North: Known for being a harsher landscape, but what it lacks in agricultural goods, it makes up for in its natural resources of iron in the Lava Reaches and Overvektige Peaks and in its modest fleece production in Racovania. The creatures and humans to be found in the north are as hardened as their homelands and are not to be taken lightly.

The East: Lush and overgrown, the eastern region is a land of bounty and abundance. Various forests and meadows cover this area, making it seem like a veritable paradise. Most parts of the east would be paradise if it wasn’t for the protective and sometimes hostile native species who live there. It should be noted that none of them are like the monsters of the north who desire to torment victims; they would just rather be left alone.

The South: With the exception of some swampy jungles in its northernmost area, the south is particularly dry. It is however a hub for major trade routes. Spice trade is the major export of this area, but there are some other goods too. Just like the hot deserts though, beware the hot tempers of its inhabitants.

The West: The west is fairly isolated from the rest of the realm. The large canyons and caves that surround the area are very good at keeping people from its greatest secret: Dew-Drop Forest, a haven in the wilds. None have yet survived the creatures of the canyons and forests to get close enough to this forest to discover its secrets and who lives there.

Central Region: The most urban of all the regions, the central area is home to the kingdom and various noble lords who control the land. The area is a bustling hodge podge of species and cultures, though it is mostly populated by humans. Other creatures are slowly beginning to immigrate here to learn about their ever increasing neighbors.

11.content:
Ah, an...interesting choice. Very well. Where to from here?

Racovania: The only thing close to a city in the north are the villages that make up Racovania. This is the primary location for humans in the region, most of whom are small livestock farmers. These villages are generally poor and rely on the patronage of the local vampires, who serve as really the only political leaders in the area, and negotiate trades with the neighboring regions to secure agricultural goods for the humans. These services do not come free, however. In exchange for these services, the vampires, almost all of whom come from the illustrious Stranken family, can have their pick of the local maidens to keep as “cattle” for themselves.

Overvektige Peaks: Home to the highest mountains in all of Yndyre, very little is known about the Overvektige Peaks. They are considered very inhospitable, and the only humans who live around the area are the iron miners. However, it is considered home to a substantial population of harpies at its highest peaks. The locals are wary and do not venture too far up the mountains, but that does not stop some foolish travelers.

Lava Reaches: Just on the southernmost edge of the Overvektige Peaks lie the Lave Reaches, the barren wastelands at the bottom of a dormant volcano. Some lava wells near the base are mildly active, but it poses no threat to Yndyre. While there are some rich iron mines nearby, many would rather avoid this area as it is the known home to succubi, who enjoy nothing more than torturing and tempting whatever victims they can find.

1112.content:
The sun rarely shown in Racovania; some put it down to the local volcanoes belching soot into the local atmosphere, others claimed that the place was just cursed and some even blamed the local population of more monstrous inhabitants of placing the region under a spell of never-ending darkness.

Sure, there were some days when the sun managed to wean its way through the cloud-cover, but those were a scant rarity.

This was a blessing to the vampires who called Racovania home. Their skin would burn and even burst into flames if exposed to too much sunshine, so the covered sun was appreciated; even if they did prefer to head out at night anyway.

One such denizen of the night was Cameena Stranken. She spent much of her time enjoying the lavishness of her castle (one of many in the region, each populated with many vampires), gazing out of the many tall windows at the bleak landscape or feeding from her cattle.

Vampires kept humans as walking blood-banks, saving them from hunting at night like animals. And in most cases these humans were treated very well; most even grew quite fat on the hedonistic lifestyle the vampires offered.

Right now Cameena was lazily settled on her throne, its bone-like design reeked of the macabre nature of her kind’s tastes, she was placing her grey chin on her knuckles as she lazily stared out the window, as hunched-over servants fidgeted in the darkest shadows. As she stared, Cameena’s belly gave a small gurgle, her vampiric hunger needed to be sated.

Rising slowly, the rubenesque vampire was now in full sight. She had thick ripe hips that made her blood-red dress billow out quite sharply, her waist thinned to a corset made of many rib-cages (which secretly held her one small shame), her gray-skinned bust appeared swollen as her breasts peeked out through the gap around her cleavage. Her long black hair spilled over her back and rested on her plump rump, perfectly straight and well washed in baths of blood.

As she sauntered forward towards the massive iron door of her throne room, Cameena’s servants ran to her side, eagerly raising her dress’s train off the stone floor or showering her with praise and compliments, before opening the doors for her with a great creak of the ancient iron.

Cameena barely even paid attention to these thralls as she made her way down the familiar trail to the second set of living quarters in the castle, where she kept her “cattle”.

The doors to this room were much smaller than that of her throne room, with bat-head doorknobs that the chattering servants quickly opened before Cameena could so much as raise her arm. As the doors gently swung open, the hungry vampire was greeted with her number one live-in resident.

Clara had been a timid girl when she had been offered up by her village to the local vampiress. It was a simple trade really, one youth, ripe with rich blood for the continued safety of the village, its people and its lifestyle. Initially she had shaken like a leaf; she was in abject terror the entire coach-trip to the castle, she shook in fear and the cold in the castle courtyard, and she desperately tried in vain to look for an escape route when she was placed in her lavish room.

Cameena had insisted many times that no harm would come to Clara, and even had her servants bring her food and fine clothes. She even offered the servants service to her, they would obey her smallest instruction, apart from grant her freedom.

It had taken many months of learning that Cameena would barely lay a finger on her, and that she was privy to an entire castle’s services for Clara to become used to her new life. Then she became indulgent, then lazy, then gluttonous. Nobody from her village ever ate well, so having enough food for an army offered to her every night was too much for the farmer’s daughter to resist. Now she ate gleefully and in vast quantities, turning her into what Cameena saw before her now.


The vampire grinned as she stared at what the years of rich decedent food had done to Clara, she was truly enormous. Her stomach was a massive pair of rolls that spilled over onto the sheets and spread to the lip of the bed. Her legs were a pair of fat stumps that jutted out from under her love-handles and partially wrapped around her stomach. Massive arms lay limp to her sides, rendered useless by the cascading layers of lard around them; she had the servants to lift food for her now, no sense wasting energy getting her arms to do it anymore. Humongous breasts rolled over the top of her belly before spread to the sides of the topmost part of the dome. And her face…oh her face; Clara had such a sweet cherubic look to her once despite her years, but now those chubby cheeks were huge sacks of fat, propped up by more chins than her father had goats. She sat on her bed constantly now, her vast weight pinning her down and stripping her of the ability to walk by herself.

She concentrated only on eating now, her wardrobe of progressively larger dresses abandoned once she drew more pleasure from stuffing herself than pressing her swelling body into increasingly more uncomfortable clothes, pretty as they were. The thralls still kept her tidy and prim though, despite her nudity; including pulling her hair up into a pair of ponytails, although this served another purpose...

“I see you are still enjoying the pleasures of my thrall’s services…” Cameena purred as Clara merely grunted happily in response, she was like a pig in mud. “I might have to ask you to pause for a mere moment Clara dear, I think I would like a bite to eat as well” the vampire added as Clara huffed, nodding her head indicating for the stooped-over creatures to leave them. Bowing many times the misshapen fiends scarpered, shutting the door behind them. Clara then leaned her head a little, revealing a pair of small wound in one of the fat rolls around her neck from where Cameena had dined before.

Licking her dark-gray lips, Cameena strode closer and leaned over the immobile cow, opening her mouth to reveal her pair of sharp white canines. Swiftly she plunged the dagger-sharp teeth into Clara’s neck and began to gulp down her meal.

The fat woman barely felt a thing, she had so much thick skin that a pair of incisions like that was nothing to her, and her body contained oh so very much rich blood.

Cameena’s eyes rolled back in her head a little, god the flavour, the taste! The other vampires were fools to deny themselves from indulging fully in their carnal pleasures. This blood was so sweet, so rich, and so good! The vampire was drinking so much of it that she could feel her corset begin to pinch a little; perhaps she should have removed it first?

11122.content:
Cameena could almost feel herself become lost in the feeding, each gulp of blood felt more delicious than the last…but she had to stop. The last thing she wanted was to drain her beloved cattle so much that she grew weak or even perished.

Stepping back to her full height, Cameena lapped up the blood dripping from her fangs in one last attempt to keep the delicious taste of the calorie-rich blood in the tip of her tongue. This then made her think to herself; the blood of such obese humans was so rich, so delicious, she NEEDED more. But she couldn’t slake her fill from just Clara; she might even lose weight as a result and that would be no good at all; she would lose her scrumptious flavor.

But then a thought came to Cameena, why not gather up a few more maidens? Most vampires had a whole slew of human women lined up to feed from, but Cameena had only taken one due to thinking someone so large would have more blood. Easier to keep and look after this way. But the gluttonous vampire had not accounted for the cravings Clara’s sweet nectar would create, there was only one answer.

“How would you like some company my dear?” Cameena purred towards the immense blob that appeared to be growing rather restless.

“Would I still have as much food?” Clara grunted. Cameena was not sure Clara was becoming hungry due to Cameena just feeding from her, or if her hunger was just that great these days that a few minutes without something to swallow caused her great discomfort.

“Of course my pet.” Cameena purred again, tenderly caressing Clara’s belly with her long-nailed hand. “You are still my prize cow, you can have anything your greedy little heart desires.”

“Good…more food then.” Clara huffed. Cameena then snapped her fingers, summoning her little thralls back once more to resume their non-stop service to the heaving mass of flesh.

***


That night, as the sun began to fade behind the mountains and a red tint spread across the lands, Cameena strode out from her castle, claw-like nails holding on to her dress to make sure it did not touch a speck of the gravel.

Ahead of her was her coach, a pitch-black vehicle pulled by four horses whose skin was so dark it made coal shine bright next to them, their eyes blood-red and their mouths fuming. Inside the coach were lavish seats, also red and so soft to the touch that one could easily fall into a sweet slumber on them.

Without as much as a word to the hooded creature sitting on the top of the coach, the driver lashed his whip, setting the horses into a frenzy as they charged towards the open iron-wrought gates and down the long winding path towards the local village.

The locals knew the sound, and in pavolvian fashion a crowd began to assemble in the village square as the horse-drawn carriage approached, slowing as it reached the huddled masses.

A hushed breath was caught in the mouths of the peasants as Cameena stepped out of her carriage. Her beauty was incredible, even with her sickly-gray skin, claw-like nails and fangs. Her face permanently looked like she had just returned from the best make-up artists in the land and her clothes were worth more than the entire village. It was no wonder some villagers willingly put up their daughters as offerings to their vampire lord, in hopes their daughter would obtain some of this wealth for themselves.

“Bring out your daughters.” Cameena spoke in a tone that while not loud, was instantly heard throughout her audience.

Shuffling around like mad, old men and women began to push forward their offspring, most shaking in terror at the site of the alpha predator standing before them. Eventually they all formed a single line in front of the vampire, and the countess began her inspection.

Travelling up and down the line Cameena surveyed her offerings. Some were tall, some were short, some blonde some dark-haired…but unfortunately for the hungry vampire all were rail thin. On one hand this disappointed the fanged monster, she was so looking forward to some instant satisfaction when she returned to her castle. Her years living off Clara’s fatty blood had made ordinary blood so…thin and weak by comparison. But on the other hand there was something exhilarating about the idea of watching her potential meals bloat and fatten up before her.

Deciding that the latter frame of mind was a better state to be in, Cameena began selecting girls, ordering each in turn to board her coach. She tried to choose the ones closest to plump, those with big boobs were a good choice, meant they had a tiny bit of a head start. They were all extremely beautiful women as well; one in particular had a fire in her eyes that told Cameena she could have made a fantastic vampire herself…but her destiny was to become a massive blood-bank for Cameen, oh well.

With a terse waft of her hand to dispel the crowds, Cameena returned to her carriage and sat on the seat opposite her latest cows. She had picked five this time rather than one; it would mean her demonic helpers would have their work cut out for them in the kitchens, but Cameena could always summon a few more to help keep all six of her cows satisfied.

The girls were all shaking in terror, clearly looking for a moment to escape the vehicle, so Cameena decided to rest their fears…or try to anyway.

“No need to fear me girls, I am not here to harm you. In fact when we reach my castle you will be treated as well as I, so long as you remain within the walls. All my servants will be your servants, my extensive wardrobe will be yours, and any desire of yours will be satisfied.” This did not help, so with a cross of her long legs Cameena tried a more personal touch. “My name is Cameena Stranken, what are your names?”

First to speak was a short red-head with plentiful freckles. “Anna…” she squeaked, prompting the others to follow suit.

“I-I-I-I’m Alisha, and this is Mina.” A girl with long black hair (not unlike Cameena’s) introduced, pointing to her twin sat next to her. Twins, Cameena had hit the jackpot. She was already day-dreaming of the two; fattened to blob-like status and sat on identical beds across from each other…delicious.

“I’m Claris…” the blonde girl next to them spoke, snapping Cameena out of her little gluttonous fantasy. She was tall and lanky, it would take a LOT of food to make her immense, Cameena thought to herself.

“Greta.” The last girl stated firmly. This was the confident and prettiest of the lot, with silky white-blonde hair and extremely beautiful features. Cameena had to stop herself licking her lips, she was going to enjoy making her so fat she couldn’t stand. In Cameena’s eyes, fat was no less beautiful than thin (even moreso in fact), and seeing someone so stunning being made even more beautiful tickled her.

“Well, such beautiful young ladies such as yourselves should not be walking around in such…filthy rags.” Cameena stated, trying to sound friendly. “The first thing we are doing when we arrive in my…or rather our castle is I shall show you the castles wardrobe, to make sure you are dressed as daintily as you look.”

The girls didn’t change their expressions at all, earning their trust was going to take a while.

A month, perhaps two or three.

Ana started to explain the first steps of her scape plan, which according to herself should be able to execute within the timeframe of a month, from there they would have an easy ride towards freedom, well as long as every single one of them played their roles to perfection

For which during the execution of the plan they should keep a low profile, play along Carmeenas sick game and hopefully they would gather enough information in a couple days to make a great scape, all of them.

The rest of the girls were not that convinced about Ana’s optimism for the situation. They had just witnessed the fate of the girls taken by the vampires, and if their bulging aching bellies weren’t enough proof, no one has ever heard of any woman escaping from a vampire’s grasp. For all they knew they would be fed to oblivion every single day until they became bigger than even Clara, that without counting the fact that being stuffed like a duck every single day would severely difficult any plan they would come with.

But truth be told, no other girl in the group a better idea, they were busier about easing the pain on their bloated bellies, so they let Ana ramble about her plan.

“First hour in the morning the twins will start searching for information around the castle, maybe a library or anything that may help us get a layout of this place” Said Ana as the young girls nodded.

Then Ana pointed towards Greta.

“Greta, you are extremely charismatic, so I need you also help to gather information, from the other people in the castle, specially from Clara”

“That…blob?!, what will she be useful for?” Grata argued.

“She has obviously been living here longer than us, maybe she knows things that may help us, she may be a useless ball of fat now, but at some point she was just like us” Ana answered.

Ana continued her description of the plan until Claris interrupted,

“It all sounds nice and dandy Ana” Claris commented, “But how are we going to do any of those things if Cameena keeps fattening us like pigs every single day?”

Ana, hadn’t thought about that, but in a swift moment of brilliance she got the answer, although this may require some sacrifice from Claris and her.

“Well, I wouldn’t like to do this but we are going to need to take one, or three for the team Claris”

Claris was a bit confused but she understood what she meant.

Ana explained what would the dynamic be during breakfast, lunch and dinner; Greta and the twins would just eat enough to survive, and Claris and herself would have to eat the rest; this in turn would mean they would start to pile up on weight faster than the others, but as they were both the skinniest, it would take more to start affecting their mobility.

Claris accepted this plan, although she was not happy about it. She had worked hard for her slim physique, well if the plan worked she would be free to regain her shape again.

At the end all the girls walked, or better said slugged to the center and the room and joined their hands together as a symbol of their compromise to the scape plan. After it all of them went straight to sleep.

Anna was the last one to fall asleep, and as she did she whispered to herself that her plan was going to work, that she would get them out of there.

____________________________________________________________________________ _________________________

Meanwhile in other part of the castle.

Carmeena was enjoying herself a small midnight snack, courtesy of Clara, who was dresses with a pink dress, which looked more like a giant courting with flower decorations and several grease stains; As the vampire was sucking her blood, the gigantic woman was devouring several drumsticks being fed directly into her mouth by an imp servant, who dashed back and forth bringing her more food.

The vampire woman finished drinking the blood that she needed, giving the obese woman a mild case of dizziness, strong enough to make her stop eating for a couple seconds, after which she resumed eating like a wild boar; Such situation surely meant that Carmeena felt excited.

The vampire woman had drink from Clara for several years now and would swear that each time it became thicker and richer every passing day in relation to every pound added to the body of her favorite pig, not a single one of her siblings or Eviana, lady of all vampires, herself had such delicious stock in their hands.

Thinking that soon she would have five more on her hand filled her with enough happiness that her heart almost started to beat again.

Carmeena swaged her way towards her chambers, sporting a bloated belly filled with the blood she had just drunk, forcing its way out of an extremely tight corset, which creaked with every step the vampire gave, slowing down her pace.

She sat at her throne and bathed on the dim moonlight which entered through a colorful stained glass window. Almost on instinct the vampire woman started to rub her belly, she hadn’t had such a feast in several months, and soon she would be able to have one every night if so she desired. Ideas started to flow inside her head. What would the new girls taste like?

Would the twins be one sweet and the other sour? The thin one would have softer blood? How would their taste as they grew as big as Clara?

And so a spark created a chain reaction inside her brain, and culminated in an idea, small but brilliant.

In a moment’s notice Carmeena ordered her imps to bring to the room her personal “Chef”

Few moments passed and inside Carmeenas throne room appeared a chunky woman, wearing a white apron which contrasted with her black hair arranged in a braid, who upon entering the room made a reverence for her lady.

“Giovanna, darling! I have to congratulate you, whatever you been feeding Clara with the last weeks have given her blood such a decadent and tasty flavor!” Carmeena said with unusual happiness to the chubby woman.

“I’m glad to hear that, I used a recipe I got from my trips to the elven lands my lady” Answered the woman. “But I doubt that you, lady of the moonlight, would have called me with such urgency only to praise my cooking skills”

“O ho ho, you are very keen darling. It is true, I called you to discuss a small plan I have for the new girls” Explained Carmeena as she descended from her throne, belly bouncing on every step.

Carmeena and Giovanna sat at the sides of a table, and the vampire started to explain her idea.

“…So basically you want to make every girl have their own distinct flavor my lady?”

“Indeed, I’ve never had these much cattle at a time, but it would be boring if all of them ended up tasting like Clara, don’t misinterpret me, she is gorgeous and delicious, but I want some variety in my life. Do you get my drill?”

“Of course my lady, and I have just the means to do it” Answered the chef.

“Excellent! in that case, after the first tithing ill choose the most delicious, and then change the flavor for the next one, and so on. Therefore, from tomorrow I want you to nurture the girls into...”

The kitchen was filled with load clangs and bangs, delicious smells wafted from everywhere, but the oddest part were the cooks. Now unlike last night I want all of you to finish your glasses before you leave last night some of the cooks were upset you didn’t finish off you cups and we don’t want to be rude now do we.” Carmeena mocked lectured like a mother. Then the feast began they all were taking big swigs of their mugs in between bites but every they look at it, it still looked all most full. As this went on the girls got more and more tipsy.

          “So what will you guys miss most about home?” Carmeena asked after they were all throughly drunk.

          “My Mikey oooooh, My -hic- sweet sweet Mike he was so -hic- good to me” Grita sobbed and to a huge bite out of a chicken lag. The girls had forgotten the plan after the sixth drink.

          “Oh I’m so sorry to hear that my darling, maybe if you are a good girl I can bring Mike to you.” This was just what Carmeena wanted, to hook them on to staying here she was no dummy she knew they were planning to escape they always did even her precious Clara. She just didn’t know their plan yet. “Well I’m off when you finish you can explore the inner castle just ask the imps at the door to lead you there ok. See you in a couple of hours for brunch!” Carmeena walked back into the the kitchen. There she met the chief again. “You truly are a genius, the refilling mugs did just what they were supposed to.” Carmeena high fived her servant in appreciation.

          “I’m glad every thing is going right to plan.”

Meanwhile back in the dinning hall...

choices: Olga Forgedotter, the bubbly barmaid!
Mahl Shatter-Spear, the surly sword for hire!
More Choices Please!
1113.content:
Olga Forgedotter

- A sweet sort of girl, something of a rarity in dreary Racovania—she's worryingly trusting!
