11131111212121121.content:
Thankfully for Olga, an alternative method for occupying her afternoon presented itself in the form of an unlocked bedroom door.

This wasn't the first time that a maid had left the door unlocked. Interestingly enough, it had also been Thora the last time. The past two times, even. It was just, then, Olga was still new to the castle, and hadn't adjusted to her new dietary regimen yet. By the time the next maid had roused her from her slumber by arrival, the door was already locked behind them. Aino would come in and curse the last woman to walk through the door before slipping a silver skeleton key into the lock and getting on with keeping her charge well-fed, or Phyla would roll her eyes and lock the door silently before announcing that Olga had missed her chance to explore.

She wouldn't be missing it now, that much was for sure.

It had been some time since Olga had gotten so much excitement. Or exercise, for that matter. Just getting out into the hallway had left her little heart fluttering a bit more than she cared to admit.

Just nerves she told herself, breathing hard, just nerves.

The fattened farm girl was in no shape to go on a grand exploration of the castle, and it would surely be time for her mid-afternoon snack before she got anywhere good anyway. The maids would be back in just a few hours, but that gave her enough time to do something, didn't it?

Now, the only question...

Which direction did she dare to go in?
11131111212121121.title: Olga on the Loose

choices: As Olga eats, Cameena drops some big news.
In the middle of Olga's eating, Aina pulls Cameena aside to whisper something...
Free choice!
111311112121211214.content:
Didn't I come by here already?

That was a question Olga found herself pondering on frequently. In her quest to explore and avoid running into any of the dutiful maids, she took every route that led downwards. That was the pathway she was most familiar with on account of every day being taken there for meals. So she knew where to go, nothing to fear, right?

Except somewhere at the halfway point of reaching the clear path down to the main hall, Olga opted to go the other way at the fork of the spiral staircases. She figured the other, unfamiliar path might lead to the same area, albeit a different section of said area. Olga's curiosity just won out; she needed exploration, and she needed to find something new to entertain herself with now that she lived here. Better yet, anything new would do, even if that meant toddling down an unfamiliar path and risk getting lost.

Sure enough, the risk of getting lost proved to be extraordinarily high.

Olga found herself pausing in her walk constantly to look around, take in her surroundings, and realize she recognized nothing of the hallway she was in. Granted, every hallway in the castle was visually identical to the other; same high walls, chandeliers hanging from the ceiling, tapestries and carpets hanging by the wall-high windows, carpets decorating the smooth cobblestone path, and giant stairs in the middle that either went up or down, with more stairs at the end of each hall also going either up or down with the ones at the end usually being the spiral variety.

Don't be scared, Olga took a sharp inhale to steel her jittery nerves. Her chubby hands fell down to caress her swollen tummy--a nervous tic she seemed to have developed as of late. For how unhappy she was with her current predicament, her newly acquired flab proved to be smooth and even comforting at times. It's like the extra weight itself was a friend of sorts.

"Just turn back, find your way back..." Olga told herself as she pivoted around and headed back to where she came. All she had to do was retrace her steps, and she'll be good!

Except...which staircase did she go down from again?

Olga blinked, staring at the twin staircases. Both were completely identical, and she hadn't been paying attention from which direction angle she had come int. They looked absolutely the same!

"...The left one, yes, I'm sure it was the left one."

She went up the stairs, already showing the first symptoms of perspiring as she forced her bulkier body up the stairs, her breathing coming out slightly labored as she went. She felt so sure this was the correct path, but as she went into the next hallway, a grim feeling of uncertainty swelled up within her.

Olga paused in her step, now feeling very much unsure as she surveyed the area around her. She wondered if the castle itself was playing tricks on her, because right now it felt like her sense of direction had been erased. Fighting back her mounting nervousness, she pressed on, waddling down the spacious hall and taking a left at the next grand stairs.

She was perplexed to see that she was at what looked to be the same hall as before, and yet that feeling of unfamiliarity crept up again. She was about to go either left or right when the sound of the doors at the far end of the hall opening reached her ears. Her heart practically jumped to her throat, along with a surge of adrenaline. Olga moved with remarkable speed, running down the immediate stairs to her right before the maids coming into the hall could spot her.

She ran down another flight of stairs after that one, feeling like she had to put more distance between herself and any maids that may come. Miraculously, this seemed to have solved her present trouble. She still had no clear idea where she was, but she was close to the main hall. She could tell by looking out the window; she was at ground-level now, and glancing through the glass she could make out the outline of the castle gates on the far horizon to the right.

An elated smile stretched her chubby cheeks. She was on much familiar grounds, at least! Not the exact same hall, but this was an improvement over being completely lost. So if she took a right from here, she should be at the Grand Hall. She immediately turned to go right.

Or she would have, had her nose not caught whiff of a particularly tantalizing smell.

"Oh," Olga said, pausing to sniff the air properly. It was a divine smell, so heavenly and delightful. The blonde was hit with familiar waves of nostalgia and hunger as she continued to breathe in the aroma. She smacked her lips, rubbed her belly, and proceeded to turn left in the direction of the smell.

Hmm, it would be about time for lunch right now, Olga pondered as she went. If she had control of her senses right now she would be hurrying back to her room. But at this moment, she could only trail after the aroma of the afternoon meal time. She couldn't help it, Lady Cameena had awakened something of a bigger appetite in her.

I am getting fat.

Yet Olga found herself not caring. As stated previously, her added pounds felt like a layer of comfort at times. And the food the Mistress ordered prepared was beyond compare. Nothing but the best for her favorite growing pet, she had said. The closest Olga could remember the quality of the food being compared to was Ms. Somaria's. And even then, Cameena's kitchen staff were on another level. Olga just couldn't resist.

"Hmm, reduce the amount of potatoes this time. Last time she had too many..."

Olga froze, fully back to her senses upon recognizing the voice coming from beyond the set of double doors she found herself in front of.

"C-Cameena...!" Olga whimpered, her hands flying to her mouth.

"And furthermore....What is it, Aina?"

Olga yelped as the doors flung open, and she was face to face with the gray-eyed stare of Cameena's head maid.

"We have ourselves a runner, my lady," Aina deadpanned.

"Oh?" Olga trembled as Cameena peeked from around Aina, and subsequently shrunk into herself as the Countess regarded her with an initial look of surprise that quickly turned into a disapproving scowl.

"Umm...hello?" Olga said weakly.

Cameena, looking noticeably plumper since the last time she'd had a taste of Olga's blood, continued to glare at her, though her expression softened slightly as she stepped forward to look at her properly. "And what are you doing here?"

"Uh...Well...You see..." Olga was sweating now, her lip trembling as she tried to form words. Try as she might, she just couldn't think of what to say in the moment.

Just then, her stomach made a growling noise loud enough to be heard by everyone present. Olga flushed as Cameena's gaze snapped to her potbelly before looking at her again. This time, the chubby vampire looked amused and not at all angry as she had been just moments ago. Olga didn't know if she should feel relieved her hunger announced itself like it did, or be further mortified at the continuing dose of misfortune.

"Ahhh, you are hungry, and the aroma must have traveled as far as your room?" Cameena grinned, now all smiles and cheery tone as she eyed Olga's flabby belly approvingly.

"Y-Yes, that's right!" Olga nodded quickly. Might as well go along with this. "A-And...I just couldn't sit still. I had to come down! Even if...it meant getting lost on the way..."

Cameena threw her head back and laughed. "Oh, I like you, darling!" she guffawed, her hands holding her own budding belly as she shook with laughter. "Didn't even call for any of the maids! I knew you were special!"

"...Thanks," Olga did not know what Cameena meant by "special" in the slightest, but she was not about to potentially ruin the chubby immortal's good mood.

"Now then," Cameena's laughter toned down to giggles. "I suppose it is convenient you came, anyway. I was going to tell you tonight that your punishment as of this day is over."

Olga perked up at that. "So that means...?"

"Yes, darling. You can leave your room whenever you wish and wander about as a proper guest again," and like blowing out a candle, Cameena's cheerful demeanor shifted into a dark, cold glare. "Provided, of course, you don't entertain any notion of escaping or resisting the next time I come to feed," she paused, and then added. "And, of course, stay away from certain areas of the castle I tell you to."

A horrible chill went down Olga's spine. She nearly lost all feeling in her legs and collapsed then and there. "O-O-Of course not, my lady..."

Cameena arched a single raven eyebrow.

Olga swallowed. "This...This is my home now."

Pleased, Cameena reached a gray hand to pat the human on the cheek. "Good," she smiled as though she hadn't been glaring just a second ago. "Now then, to the table with us. Come, come!"

Olga let herself be grabbed by the hand and led. By this point, she was used to her mistress'...eagerness when it came to watching her eat. Honestly speaking, if she wasn't so unnerved, Olga might have even found it charming.

Olga froze. Cameena? Charming? If she wasn't so skittish at the moment, she'd be giggling at the image.

"Something amuses you?"

The flabby farm-girl yelped, stiffening in posture as her cheeks reddened. Apparently, she wasn't as uneasy as she thought. Why else would she have unknowingly let a tiny giggle fly out and allow Cameena to hear it?

"J-Just looking forward to lunch," Olga smiled, rubbing her belly to appear convincing. Even then, she really was rubbing her belly a bit too much lately.

Cameena beamed, her fangs glinting. "It makes me very happy to hear that, dear! Oh, you'll just love this spread...!"
111311112121211214.title: Down, Down, Down, Down Among the Devil

choices: focus on pampering Olga more.
focus on fattening Olga faster.
focus on making Olga's blood richer.
1113111121212112141.content:
And what a spread it was. The banquet hall was filled with what normally would have been enough to feed Olga’s entire village; there were massive succulent meats, huge hill-like loafs, trays upon trays of desserts… an absolute smorgasbord.

“Well… maybe I will have some of it…” Olga murmured hesitantly as she was guided to her seat. Sure she had gotten fat, really fat, but there was no way she could eat this much… or should for that matter. The dress that the fattened blacksmiths-girl had been provided with on arrival was tight on her like a sausage skin now. Cameena however was having none of it.

“Uh uh uh…” She replied with a clucking of her tongue. “You’re a growing girl, and my maids worked so hard on preparing all this for you.”

Olga gulped and picked up her cutlery, and began to tuck into a pile of baked potatoes nearest to her. She didn’t want to look too keen, but gods had she been hungry lately. Meanwhile, Cameena paced around her captive, like a starving wolf around a wounded beast.

It wasn’t just Olga who had an appetite problem; ever since she had tasted the blonde girl’s blood, Cameena had been craving nothing else. Seeing Olga had her wetting at the mouth on nearly every occasion. The vampire reminded herself to only feed from Olga when she needed to, lest she wear the girl (and her blood) thin. But the taste… it was like sweet nectar to her, more delicious than any other blood she had ever tasted before, how could she resist…

No. Cameena had to resist; she was a higher vampire, not some feral beast like those Lamia. She had an air of nobility and class to keep, and it wouldn’t do for other vampires (especially those of her own bloodline) to find out she had been glutting herself like an animal. It had started to show as well; today Cameena had struggled to put her corset on, whenever she tried to wrap the garment around her thick waist, an extra large roll of flab bulged out to obstruct her. Several maids had to be called up to help. She needed to distract herself, the sight of Olga, feasting and fattening before her was driving her wild.

“Hem hem…” Cameena coughed. Olga responded, barely, the plump woman only slowed her eating down, not stopping completely. “Since you are staying in my castle indefinitely, I thought I should make you aware that there will be a masquerade ball held here in the coming months…”

Olga stared blankly.

“It’s a party, we all wear masks and dance to music…” Cameena continued, “And since my halls will be filled to the brim with vampires… some of which will have travelled long distances to get here… I thought I should offer you the chance to attend.”

The color quickly drained from Olga’s face… more vampires… here?!

“I should of course remind you that I do not desire to have any harm come to you… so trust me when I say that being by my side will be the safest place in the castle… you are not obliged to attend of course… but do choose wisely when the time comes.”

There was still a look of terror over Olga’s face, so Cameena tried to calm her nerves some more. “I hear some other vampires will be bringing their cattle as well… you might enjoy their company…”

That seemed to work, Olga seemed to relax, and continued to eat. Speaking of which, Cameena was very impressed; the constant large meals Olga had been subjected to had really swelled her appetite and capacity wonderfully, no surprise that she was growing so quickly.

Cameena continued to pace as she inspected her cattle. Olga had developed a cute swaddling second chin that jiggled as she ate; a good sign that Olga would have some thick cushioning around her neck when Cameena planned to feed from her. The blacksmith’s daughter wouldn’t even feel the pin-pricks of the vampire’s fangs next time. It was so much easier when her prey didn’t have to stop eating when Cameena wanted to feed, didn’t waste any time that way that could be spent making her succulent cow fatter and tastier.

Eventually Olga began to slow down, her breathing thicker and heavier, but her movements were barely slowed. Cameena soon noticed the problem however, and it wasn’t to do with her precious blood bank’s capacity.

“Let me help you there…” Cameena purred into Olga’s ear as she leaned down, copious gray cleavage wobbling in front of the seated woman’s eyes. Then, Cameena lowered one hand to Olga’s belly; there was a slight flinch at her cold touch, as the vampire stroked her hand across Olga’s rightmost thick fat flank, stopping at one of the dresses seams.

With a quick flick of her index finger, Cameena slashed her long razor-sharp nail across the stitches, tearing a great gash in the material. Moving to the other side of her charge, Cameena repeated the action on Olga’s left side. As she did, the chubbier woman#s belly surged forwards, engulfing more of her lap. “Better?” Cameena asked with a predatory grin.

Olga nodded greedily, her gluttony overtaking her common sense as she reached for more food.

"Don't worry about the dress, I will have my best seamstress make you a new one..." Cameena purred, "It will be nice and roomy for you... plenty of space to grow into." The vampire was happy to make subtle little comments about the fate she had planned for Olga, not like the girl was listening anyway. The pleasurable noises she was making as she ate was plenty indication that she was far too absorbed in trying to clean the table.

Cameena was quite happy to let Olga waddle around the castle again, there was little chance of her leaving now; she was too plump to run for too long, too chubby to construct a method to escape, and it wouldn’t be too long before she was too large to even fit in the dumb waiters or clothes chutes.

Watching as the well-rounded girl stuffed herself silly, Cameena thought back to her cattle comments; with Olga’s plump face, small nose and flushed pink face… she was looking more like a sow than a heifer. It was all going as planned, with Cameena planning to...
1113111121212112141.title: Testing the cattle

choices: Olga succumbs to Cameena's methods—she becomes soft, spoiled, and fat!
Olga won't be turned so easy—something happens to keep her spark of escape
Olga's blood is very special—and it makes Cameena very large, very fast
11131111212121121411.content:
What separated connoisseurs from consumers, the true line in the sand between those who really appreciated their meals and beasts with simple hematophagic dependencies, was the ability to delay gratification in hopes of a greater reward.

Cameena Stranken—or any vampire on an empty stomach—could have drained Olga in a night with some difficulty. Her body limp and useless, her corpse would have been tossed aside for the maids to tend to. Lamia did this frequently, as did the Vampires of the North in ancient times. As Man and the Beasts learned to farm, so too had the nightwalkers.

The trick to keeping an accessible source of sustenance with beasts came with domestication. Cattle, pigs, and fowl were captured, bred, and fed well until it was their turn to be called to the dinner table. So too it was that Humans served his purpose for Vampires. Whereas cows and pigs were slaughtered, humans had come to be viewed as something to suckle on. A human kept in captivity meant that there was always a meal ready, which kept the free-range humans unculled in their little towns down the mountain, with the added benefit of hardly having to breed them. Though few gave them the attention that Cameena specialized in, many of the girls she'd claimed from Racovania were still alive somewhere in the vast web of Stranken family. Given proper care, a human could last for quite a long time.

But keeping their humans was a bit more difficult than keeping cows, pigs, sheep, or chicken.

None of them could pick locks or open doors. None of them could convince servants to let them out.

Keeping a human was much more than an assurance that their new master wasn't going to drain them dry. While fear was a very useful tool to corral their livestock, Cameena had found that it had the equally unpleasant effect of sparking ill-plotted escape attempts that often left wounded and exposed to the elements. By the time they find the bodies, they aren't good for much.

No, the most important factor in keeping them from running away is in making sure that they don't want to. Softening them up a little is a great way to ensure that they can't run away—Cameena had taught that trick to plenty of the younger nightlings—but the most effective and efficient way is to make them feel as much at home in their new life as possible.

Domestication turned wolves into dogs, tigers into cats, and bulls into livestock.

The same trick worked wonderfully on humans.

***


"No trips around the castle, today?"

Thora had said it with an air of satisfaction to her. She had made it known more than any of them that she wasn't a fan of Olga plundering into this and that. It made her job difficult, and she had a rather unfortunate tendency to barnacle herself to whichever maid had the luck to have been the last one to talk to her. Sometimes that meant following her around for an hour or two, asking inane questions about this and that before eventually growing bored and toddling off.

Olga had been dressed for lunch, a loose flowy gown hung off of her fatted shape. The swell of her stomach, still ripe from breakfast, billowed it out that much more. She had been laying in bed since then, her hands resting dutifully on her stomach as it squelched and struggled in vain to digest what had been a particularly heavy beginning to her day.

"Not today." she said in a full, but soft voice, "I think I ate too much..."

Thora tried not to look too pleased.

"Should I tell Giovanna to cut back?" the red headed maid barely hid a smirk, "That maybe you'd like it if there were less sausage in your omelets? Or perhaps there are too many eggs? Did you not enjoy the bacon, or was it the porridge?"

"N-No, don't do that..." Olga huffed, having grown rather attached to her big breakfasts, "But maybe a light lunch today?"

"Of course." Thora grabbed at the doorhandle, "I'll tell the lady at once."

Once she was alone, Olga regretted suggesting the change in menu. She was sure that it wouldn't be light (nothing had been, ever since she'd gotten here) but what if she was still hungry after a while, before her snack? Then she'd be starving before dinner...

Olga drummed her stomach contemplatively. For the past few days, she'd hardly left her room. Ever since Ms. Stranken had told her that she could leave, suddenly the appeal had waned a bit. Her maids had been coming in more of their own free will, just to check on her. They'd been tending to her in the bath now, which was nice. And while she liked eating lunches and dinners in the grand hall, her favorite meals were breakfasts and her afternoon snacks, where she could eat at her own pace in her own bedroom.

Her own bedroom. When had she started thinking of this as her bedroom, rather than the room where she was kept?

This room—opulent and grand as it was—was the only piece of the castle that Olga considered hers. No matter how incorrect she may have been, somehow coming back here after a long day of wandering around the castle or exceptionally long dinners with the lady of the house, getting drained of her blood here and there... it was nice to think that she had someplace to go, now that she'd been taken from her home.

Her breakfast weighing heavily on her stomach, her eyelids began to close. Her thoughts drifted off into the ether as Olga fell asleep for what was now a customary pre-lunch nap.

Not long after, the doorhandle jostled once more as Cameena stepped lightly into the bedroom.

"There she issss..." she smiled, "Fast asleep."

Cameena's chubby gray cheeks dimpled as she took slow, methodical steps over to Olga's sleeping shape. She'd fallen back, her hands resting lazily on her chubby stomach as it domed underneath her gown. Her long blonde hair—having never once been braided in that farm girl design since she'd come to the castle—flowed like a river down her neck. Cameena brushed it aside and plunged her fangs into the girl's skin.

Olga awoke, briefly, before drifting off to sleep as anemia set in.

"A little snack of my own." Cameena purred and stroked Olga's gut lovingly, "You have a wonderful brand, my dear."

As the fattened farm girl fell into a deeper sleep, one fueled by blood loss and ensured a hearty appetite when she woke up, Cameena licked her blue lips appreciatively. Her supple shape resting heavily on the bed beneath her, Olga was quite the appetizer.

"You are coming along wonderfully, love." She said in a husky voice, "I'll have Giovanna make you something especially nice for lunch today."
11131111212121121411.title: Domesticating the Farm Girl

Both woman are outgrowing everything in the castle...
111311112121211214111.content:
*Click*

*Clack*

The sound of Cameena’s high-heeled shoes echoed through her cavernous hallways as she made her way to get lunch. As the vampire trod the familiar route through her castle, she felt a new sensation; with each step, her stomach was touching her lap.

Cameena had never been a skinny person, even back when she was a human, but her figure always had this… rubenesque tendency. Now however her body seemed to have had enough of sending excess calories to her more womanly areas, and was now diverting excess calories to other areas. Not that Cameena minded of course, she had always been a woman of ruthless excess; even if now it was much harder to hide.

It was Olga’s blood that was doing this to her; the flavor was so intense, like a drug. There was a richness that was hard to describe; it made Cameena think back to when she had first bundled Olga away into her castle, and the curious girl had asked her about the flavors of blood. Before she could have comfortably described the taste of the wine of the vein that flowed from every neck she had pierced. But now, she could not be so confident.

But it was not only the addictive taste that was causing her new-found blubber to accumulate so rapidly; it seemed that this extreme richness of Olga’s blood came with another side-effect… it was super high in calories. That might have really been the cause of both, but Cameena didn’t really care as to the how’s and why’s Olga taste so delicious. But the curvaceous vampire did know that she needed more of it.

That was partly why she had been so invested in making Olga so fat. With each added pound of weight, that was an extra bit of richness added to her blood, a touch greater resilience to being fed from, and a decreased ability to escape. Not that the possibility of that happening was very high anymore, Cameena had been doing everything in her power to domesticate Olga, to make sure she never wanted to leave.

The girl had been quite hesitant at first, but it seemed she had finally succumbed. She spent most of her waking moments in her bed, being waited on by the diligent maids of the castle, as an entire banquet was offered up to her. Her life had been spent mostly going hungry, there was no way she could pass up a bottomless feast for long.

As the hungry vampire approached Olga’s quarters, she saw the tell-tale signs that she was still eating well. Maids were approaching in quick-step with platters piled high with food, entering and exiting quickly to go fetch more. Cameena was impressed; Olga may have stopped coming to the dining hall for feasts, but was very content with the feast being brought up to her instead. Cameena liked that, it meant the bloated blonde wasn’t burning any precious fat waddling up and down the stairs to get her food.

The maids stopped in their tracks, waiting for their mistress to enter the room. Cameena strode inside, her thick gray thighs rolling across each other under her long train. As she passed through the door, brushing it with her hands, she pondered. These were the final preventative measures in case Olga did have a change of heart and decided to make a break for it… once she was big enough for the frame to prove impossible of course.

“Hello my dear Olga, how are you today?” Cameena purred in a predatory fashion as her eyes locked onto her target.

Olga was lying on her bed, legs splayed out at a ninety degree angle, allowing her fulsome stomach to roll between her pudgy thighs. Her fat udders were perched atop her hillock-like belly, providing a perch for some of the side-plates to rest on. The rest were simply laid on her bed, as thick sausage fingers grasped them, before happily guiding the contents to their destination in her waiting maw. Olga’s face would have seemed unrecognizable from the petite sunken look she possessed before; now her cheeks were well-rounded, her neck ringed with a massive second chin that rest on her chest, and the slightly pointed shape had given way to an overall roundness. Yes she was certainly more than double the woman she had been on arrival.

“Hello *oomph*” Olga replied, her eyes meeting the vampire’s gaze. But no longer filled with fear, there was almost a sign of excitement, as if some pavlovian link had been made between the sight of Cameena and more culinary satisfaction. She didn’t even stop eating as Cameena approached, such a good girl.

“I think you know what time it is…” Cameena purred as she slunk over, sliding her bloated backside onto the bed-covers just to the left of Olga.

Olga nodded, and ceased eating, but not before licking her fingers clean of any residue.

Cameena leaned in, the back of her right hand pushing Olga’s long blonde hair back over her shoulder. It really was getting quite out of control… perhaps she should send a maid up with a set of shears, cut it nice and short, then it wont get in the way of either of them eating. She also noticed that Olga's latest dress was starting to get tight; the fabric was clearly strained the most around her big midsection. The vampire made a mental note to tell the maids that did the seam-stressing that they needed to make a much greater allowance around the belly, she didn't want Olga's appetite to be artificially curbed.

Lifting her right hand, Cameena planted her palm on top of Olga’s head. The girl didn’t even flinch at the icy-cold touch of her undead owner, as she began to stroke from the top of her head to the back. Cameena then leaned her head in, the tip of her nose brushing the ring of neck fat insulating her cattle’s most vulnerable spot. Opening her mouth wide, Cameena slit her fangs through Olga’s dense fat skin, before plugging the wound with her icy lips, and she began to drink.

The taste danced across her tongue, such exquisite flavor… oh it was just otherworldly! If Cameena had her eyes open, they would have been rolling back in her head, this was better than any feeling she had ever felt… it made her almost feel alive again. She wished the flow would never end!

But she had to stop some time, or else her favorite cattle would suffer for it. Reluctantly, Cameena retracted her fangs from Olga’s fatty neck, with one last lick to both clean the wound and get the last droplets inside her gullet.

Throughout the entire thing Olga had remained conscious; granted she did seem slightly out of it now, but it was certainly an improvement. Cameena thought back to some cattle she had owned previously that were so big that they didn’t even notice Cameena feeding from them… hell one didn’t even stop eating! The thought of Olga one day reaching that size, and her taste improving along with it, was breathtaking.

But there was work needed to get her there.

“How are you feeling my dear?” Cameena asked, placing a palm onto Olga’s cheek and checking her eyes. They still responded well, but were much duller than a few minutes ago. “Hmmm… come!” Cameena snapped, beckoning to one of the maids that had been standing closest to the doorway.

“Yes mistress?” The woman asked, bowing.

“Go down to the kitchens and tell them to prepare a lot more food for the cattle’s quarters. I have recently fed from her and she needs extra sustenance.”

On receiving her commands, the maid bowed and left.

Cameena had noticed that a bit more life stirred into Olga when she mentioned more food. And was that… a lick of her lips? Well well well, she was becoming the perfect hungry cow…
111311112121211214111.title: Double Feeding Time

11131111212121121413.content:
The only thing tastier than a well-prepared meal is one that has been seasoned appropriately. That is the one constant in the culinary arts Cameena takes to heart the most.

Some would call her greedy, some even go as far as to label her a glutton. To Cameena, the biting words from her own kin hardly hold any weight to her self-esteem. They can call her what they wish, she knows she is a true woman of the night. Not like the Lamia, and certainly not like her relatives who would seize any of their cattle, drain them dry, and then move on to the next course.

She doesn't say it often, but Cameena considers herself an artist. She has a much more refined palette, and her methods may draw much mockery from her family, but at least, as evident in her plush figure, the end result pays well. Her family just has the misfortune of not being capable of understanding how fruitful and long-lasting for the long run her methods are. Cameena may be just a capable a bloodsucker as any other creature of the night, but she is not wasteful.

And with this human, Olga Forgedotter, she has discovered (and thus, obtained) the proverbial diamond in the rough. Her blood is special--very special. In all her years as an undead immortal collecting human maidens for food source, she has never tasted a blood as succulent and enthralling as Olga's. She is truly one of a kind.

At present, Cameena lounges in the privacy of her chambers, dressed comfortably in her favorite black nightgown with crimson outlines. She sits on an armchair, her right hand holding a cup of wine gracefully in her fingers while her left makes odd, absentminded strokes at her round belly. Her posture is one of nonchalance with an air of imperiousness, one leg crossed over the other as she leans back into her seat, humming thoughtfully as she takes the occasional sip from her wine cup.

Agnes, her maid for the night, dutifully refills her glass without a word.

Cameena hums with closed eyes, feeling for the beating presence of Olga two floors below her. Her precious cattle sleeps peacefully, and Cameena can tell by the ever so often shifts in rhythm that she is snoring softly. Her deliciously fattened form rests comfortably on that mattress fit for royalty, and the countess can the silhouette of her arms as they rest on top of her gut. Inside that softened body flows the sweetest blood, the most intoxicating brand any human could have possibly possessed. And it is all Cameena's.

She is truly magnificent.

"What was that, my lady?"

Cameena blinks. Seems she was voicing her thoughts again. An odd occurrence that seems to happen whenever she focuses on Olga.

"Ah, it's nothing," Cameena says smoothly, waving a dismissive hand. "You can retire for the night."

Agnes bows in gratitude. "Thank you, my lady. I am at your service at all hours."

Cameena utters a little noncommittal noise in return, her gaze focused on observing Olga sleep down below. She takes the occasional sip from her wine, her gaze never moving from her sleeping, growing pet.

"Mmm, should I come down for a snack?" Cameena's left hand rubs at her bulging belly slowly, the idea of tasting some more of that enthralling blood proving a very tempting proposition. "Mm, but...she's not at her full potential..."

Ah, the joys of properly seasoning one's cattle. Sacrificing eager indulgences to increase the potency of the blood's taste. It's annoying, but Cameena loves the end result too much to be truly bothered by the inconvenience.

"Oh yes..." Cameena purrs, her belly stroking gaining some energy as she thinks of the delicacy that awaits her. The payoff for her patience. "Yes, that will do nicely..."

She watches Olga sleep for a while longer before retiring for the night. Cameena is aware she is growing unusually fond of her latest prize, and honestly she doesn't find problem with it. Olga is one beautiful specimen, and her special brand of blood mandates extra care. Of course Cameena feels the need to dote on her.

Besides, looking at her sleeping form, at ease in her castle, it brings a certain peace of mind to her. Never before have one of her cattle looked so at home in her domain.

***


"Something the matter, darling?"

"Oh, umm..." Olga fidgeted slightly in her seat, partly in response to Cameena's sudden query, and partly because she was subtly adjusting herself in her seat. She was very embarrassed to note her cheeks were on the verge of drooping ever slightly off the chair's edges. "Just...there's more meat than usual."

Cameena arched a black eyebrow, smiling amusedly. "So there is."

"Umm..." Olga considered making a point on the increased meat, but found she couldn't voice it. "It's...great! Lamb is my favorite," she finished lamely before quickly taking a bite with her silverware. She lost herself to the deliciousness, mewling in pleasure. "So good...!"

Cameena smiled, pleased. "Just a moment, dear,"

"Hm?" Olga turned to address her lady, and promptly froze as Cameena's gray, cold finger pressed gently against her lower lip, right at her budding double-chin. She shivered slightly as the chubby immortal dragged her finger up, pulling it back to show the meat juice her finger had collected.

"Here," Cameena purred, pushing her finger into Olga's mouth.

The blonde was paralyzed both by having her personal space penetrated and the cold feel of her mistress' finger in her mouth. But she couldn't resist. Meekly, Olga started to suckle on the vampire's finger, her cheeks reddening as she enjoyed licking and sucking off the bits of meat juice clinging to Cameena's finger.

Cameena gave a low, soft moan as she plucked her finger from Olga's lips deliberately slowly. "How did that taste?"

"...Good," Olga was feeling very confused. The experience just now had been unnerving and yet...interesting. She wanted to dive back to her meal to drown out these weird sensations. "Th-Thank you..."

"You're welcome," Cameena said cheekily. "Aren't I just the best host, my dear?"

"Y-Yes," a feeling of boldness overcame Olga. "The best M-Mistress...!" She meant it mostly to keep the bloodsucker pleased. The happier Cameena was, the more good things would be for Olga.

"Good of you to say," Cameena smiled. "Now eat up. The steaks in particular are supposed to be extra tender with lots of juice."

***


"Hold a moment!" Cameena had said another day at lunch, stopping Olga just as she was bringing a piece of bread to her mouth.

"Wh-What is it, my lady?"

Cameena reached forward with a knife, stabbing at the plate of butter to collect some, and then slather it on the bread in the blonde's grasp. "It was lacking in butter. Do add more on all the next slices you consume, will you?"

"Y-Yes," Olga never questioned Cameena on her strange orders anymore. She'd been doing this for a while now, and she'd learned to just roll with it.

"How's the chicken?" Cameena asked next as she sat back in her seat.

Olga's eyes brightened as she smiled honestly. "It's really good! Cooked to perfection, and very tender! I haven't had chicken since..." she paused, a rueful smile dimpling her cheeks. "...since I was younger."

Sensing the depressive mood shift in her pet, Cameena took a quick initiative. She took hold of Olga's arm, startling the young human at the cold touch again. Olga let out a strangled noise as Cameena brought her wrist to her cheek, nuzzling at it lovingly. Her face reddened as Cameena turned her chubby wrist to kiss at the veins.

"Mmm, I am so happy to hear that," Cameena said lowly, fangs glinting as her red eyes met with Olga's blue. "Keep eating, sweetie. You can have as much as you want."

Olga dived back into her food only too eagerly, once again to bury the surge of conflicting emotions Cameena seemed to have fun triggering in her.

Cameena, meanwhile, chuckled huskily. Delicious blood and delightfully skittish. I like her.

***


"So much for showing restraint..." Cameena reprimanded herself thickly as she toddled into her room, her belly full from having just fed on Olga for the night. "But can I help it? Of course not! She just had to be extraordinarily delicious. And I've been helping make her blood taste even better lately, so I can't help it if I nibble! Ohoho, I am so naughty!"

She lied down on her bed, happy to be off her chubby feet. Her hands rested on her belly as she rubbed at it. "Hmm, but that is true. She is unusually delicious..." she mused. "I daresay she's even tastier than Clara..."

She paused, reflecting on the implications of that statement. For a brief moment, the gears were turning in her head for a...particularly nefarious idea. But then she shook her head, dismissing the idea almost as soon as it came. For some reason, turning Olga into...that felt distasteful. Not to mention unworthy of her potential.

Cameena slapped her belly, staring at the canopy of her bed all the while. "I will not have her turned into that if I can help it. Her blood is too precious. And rightfully belongs to me. All of her is mine," she swore darkly. "All mine..."
11131111212121121413.title: Augmenting the Taste of Olga

(Hey, everyone! Vocal here! Just wanted to thank everyone for taking this story idea as far as it is now. Honestly, I'd never thought it would gain this much traction. Anyway, just wanted to let you all know how grateful I am. And now, allow me to add another chapter to the story of Olga and Cameena. Hope you all enjoy it!)

Normally, when it came to intimate affairs with the livestock her illustrious clan obtains, Cameena usually sustains a mostly professional yet, oftentimes, gluttonous demeanor, especially when it came to her long-term ambitions of acquiring livestock with blood akin to nectar fit for the gods.

And yet, as of late, while she finished feeding on one of the...lesser quality livestock she has acquired, Cameena almost...distant, as if it didn't feel the same as occasionally feeding on Olga's blood. As she slinked back onto the floor, with Thora promptly wrapping her vampiric mistress in a silken dark red robe. the dutiful maid easily noticed her mistress's current behavior, which gave her some subtle hints of concern as she politely asked, "...Is something the matter, Mistress? You seem...distant."

"*sigh* Obviously." Cameena huffed, akin to a human enduring a substantial lack of sleep, as Thora casually wrapped the sash around Cameena's body to decently cover her mistress's mostly nude form, obviously noting how the vampiric countess seemed to be just a dab bit heftier than the previous week, and the week before, and so on.

"...Well, if it is any consolation, Mistress, I am here to assist you." Thora boldly stated, like the dutiful servant she was to her dark lady, to which Cameena briefly displayed, surprisingly, a grateful upward curve of her lips then retorted, "...I greatly appreciate your ever-consistent loyalty, Thora. However...these are circumstances I must overcome solely by my own clawed hands."

"Of course, my Mistress." Thora complied, bowing before her mistress of the night, where the loyal maid proceeded to head towards the castle kitchen, most likely to prepare a bountiful feast for Cameena's most favored livestock, thus leaving the vampiric countess to her own machinations.

However, once Thora had disappeared from her sight, Cameena soon reverted back into her seemingly disillusioned state of mind, exhaling a deep sigh whilst she rubbed the bridge of her nose with her left thumb, index finger, and middle finger in some form of frustrated self-contemplation.

"...By the damnable gods, what is happening with me as of late? It seems that all I can think about is...her. Olga..." Cameena thought to herself, as she began to slowly pace out of the medieval underbelly of her gothic abode, feeling the recently acquired adipose on her gray-skinned form wobble and jiggle subtly with each forward step. Her thoughts continued, "And yet, despite my attempts to *blech!* sober up... Why is it that I can't shake these aberrant thoughts from my conscience?"

For a paused moment, Cameena looked down at her right hand, and much to her complete surprise...it was shaking a little! Was it in hesitation?

Anticipation?

Or...Could it be merely from withdrawal?

For the time being, it seemed that she seemingly longed for the Forgedotter girl, clearly for some undetermined reasons, as an uncannily strange idea had creeped it's way into her subconscious...

***


Meanwhile, back in her personal quarters, Olga had just finished consuming a hearty breakfast full of sausages, omelets, and baked scones, as she calmly licked the succulent crumbs and syrup remains from her plump fingers, especially from the meal that Aina had brought up to her personally, obviously out of duty to keep her well-fed.

Instinctively, she slowly felt how utterly stuffed her now protruding belly had become, as the fabric of her newly resized nightgown was starting to become a little snug around the abdominal regions of her physique, which didn't seem to annoy her as much as it used to.

"*sigh* ...I've gotten pretty fat." She thought, noting her encroaching boredom. Sure, she felt satisfied with having a full stomach, but even that was slowly losing it's mysticism and charm.

"...Maybe a walk around the castle will stave off my boredom." Olga continued, where she soon began the now slow arduous task of dismounting herself from the lavishly comfortable confines of her bed, which was made all the more longer due to her now full stomach acting like several sacks of potatoes weighing her down somewhat.

Yet fortunately for her, she was somehow able to pull it off, as she carefully lifted her corpulent self off of the edge of the bed, now standing fully upright, having to cradle her almost painfully full stomach with her left hand to lessen the overstuffed pangs of discomfort in her expanded abdomen.

"*huff* huff* Okay, that...was a little harder than I thought--" Olga said to herself, whose attention was soon abruptly diverted toward the audible sounds of someone entering her room, as both double doors swung open with seemingly relative ease. Moments later, it was revealed to be none other than...
111311112121211214132.title: The Mistress's Contemplations

choices: "Yes, I would love to learn how to read." Cameena makes the proper arrangements
Aina barges in. "News from a relative regarding the masquerade, my Lady."
